compatibility.notes: LGPL-2.1-or-later allows linking with proprietary software under certain conditions, but static linking may impose stricter requirements.

key_requirements: Include a copy of the LGPL license with the distributed software.
State any changes made to the library when distributing modified versions.
Ensure that the original author's reputation is not affected by modifications.
license.name: LGPL-2.1-or-later
obligations: Distributors must provide the same rights to recipients as granted to them.
Source code must be made available when distributing the library.
If linking with other code, complete object files must be provided.
Recipients must be informed of their rights under this license.
